title: -RIOT PLEASE READ-
body:
TO Riot
Please check the server all the time to prevent the problem in server that affects the game
 The game was played on 22nd January,2015  between 3:15~3:45
All of 10 summoners kept on disconnecting from server, the ping raised up to 2000. 
1 summoner in the enemy's team were even disconnected and could not return.
As its new season, everyone is playing the Elo(tier) Placement. This game should be LOST PREVENTED. 
However, the game ended up with one team winning and one team losing. For some of summoners, it was their last game so they got placed in a particular elo. I will upload the video as soon as possible. 
PLEASE RIOT. Everyone is willing to get their right elos. All we want is playing a **** NORMAL game.
SO PLEASE RIOT CHECK THE SERVER AND TAKE CARE OF PEOPLE WHO CANNOT ******** DO ANYTHING WITH THIS.
THEY ARE MANY MANY PEOPLE WHO LOSES THEIR TIERS UNFAIRLY THESE DAYS. IF THIS PROBLEM KEEP**** CAUSING, RIOT I'M TELLING YOU 
LEAGUE OF LEGENDS WON'T BE PEOPLE'S ******** FAVORITE GAME. 
THANK YOU. 
> 1. PLEASE REPLY ASAP TO FIX THIS PROBLEMS.

replies.body: 2 of my games were lost because of mass disconnects as well :(
Yeah this happened in 4 of my placement games.. most of my team was up and down more then a boat in rough sea's.. it would be nice if riot would allow us to reset and try again
Yeah this happened to me too last game. Please Riot can you loss prevent these games??

Same thing happened to me last game. Was playing ranked and everyone kept dc'ing at the start. I got a dc first blood somehow though lol. But the same thing happened last night as well, with everyone dc'ing for the first 10 or so minutes of the game.. I wonder why this is..
